channel.title: How to make party hats wearable for all players
channel.description: How can i change it so that players and mods and admins can wear party hats my settings are currently just for admins but i dont know hot to change it i searched ion client.java and couldnt find it

item.title: How to make party hats wearable for all players
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

Look for the item codes of the pary hats, and search that in client.javaâ€¦

-then you should see player-rights=> 2 as you said, change as needed:

0=Normal Player 1= Moderator 2= Administrator 3= Owner

Read full topic
item.source: How to make party hats wearable for all players
